column4: For some reason I seem to get MUCH higher load times for webpages in Firefox 2 in Ubuntu 7.10 versus Firefox 3 in Windows XP, both of which run on this same computer. Any idea why?
Yeh, I probably will, but I had the same thing before even when XP ran Firefox 2.
lots of memory leak in firefox keep less tabs opened and use few addons and restart firefox after 3-4 hours
